column4: i used the unetbootin , created the disk
but the same thing happened
how'd it turn out?
did you get the iso from the Ubuntu site?
which version of ubuntu did you dl?
on what machine?
and does it boot into the live environment at all?
i mean the machine your installing ubuntu with a flash drive...can you boot into the "Live Environment"?
yes i can open the environment
i wonder what happens when from the "Live Environment" if you open the terminal and type in:    sudo fdisk -l
does that show your hard drive?
yes
so the hard drive is there...can you install from the "Live Environment"?
this time it hangs in the first page :S
in the welcome page
hmm...how long has it been stuck?
and gparted is not opening ( keeps scanning alldevices)
gksudo gparted
use that in the terminal
same thing happens when opening gparted from terminal , and still hangs in the pereparing to install phase
what happens if you use a live cd instead of the flashdrive?
could be your flash device.  could be the iso is corrupted.
i hope it works for you
